TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LAContextReplyHandler(bool success, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed LAContextReplyHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Signature for a function to be invoked in response to a invocation.
Docs.remarks: The method when invoked returns a boolean indicating if the policy evaluation was successful, and on failure a detailed description of the error in the error parameter.
